title.value: Современные ветеринарные требования в обеспечении безопасности производства и переработки мяса птицы
Modern veterinary requirements in the security of production and processing of poultry meat

journal.title: Animal Agriculture and Veterinary Medicine : quaterly research and practice journal

person.name: Rusinovich, A.A., Belarus State Veterinary Center, Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: As consequence of globalization of live animal and foodstuff trade trans-border problems in the area of food safety arose. In this day and age it is very important to take into account international practice of Animal Health Office work in manufac-turing and trade of food raw material and food products, including poultry enterprise. The problems we've named in the article, which includes epizootic situation, witnesses about necessity of improvement and restructuring of Veterinary Service
